mn143:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn143:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena anathapindiko gahapati abadhiko hoti dukkhito balhagilano.
mn143:2.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati annataram purisam amantesi:
mn143:2.3: “ehi tvam, ambho purisa, yena bhagava tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena bhagavato pade sirasa vandahi:
mn143:2.6: Yena cayasma sariputto tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vandahi:
mn143:2.8: So ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vandati’ti.
mn143:2.10: ‘sadhu kira, bhante, ayasma sariputto yena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’”ti.
mn143:2.11: “Evam, bhante”ti kho so puriso anathapindikassa gahapatissa patissutva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so puriso bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn143:2.14: Yena cayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam sariputtam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so puriso ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
mn143:2.16: So ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vandati;
mn143:2.18: ‘sadhu kira, bhante, ayasma sariputto yena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya’”ti.
mn143:3.1: Atha kho ayasma sariputto nivasetva pattacivaramadaya ayasmata anandena pacchasamanena yena anathapindikassa gahapatissa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi. Nisajja kho ayasma sariputto anathapindikam gahapatim etadavoca:
mn143:3.2: “kacci te, gahapati, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam? Kacci te dukkha vedana patikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; patikkamosanam pannayati, no abhikkamo”ti?
mn143:4.1: “Na me, bhante sariputta, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
mn143:4.2: Seyyathapi, bhante sariputta, balava puriso tinhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evameva kho me, bhante sariputta, adhimatta vata muddhani uhananti.
mn143:4.3: Na me, bhante sariputta, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
mn143:4.4: Seyyathapi, bhante sariputta, balava puriso dalhena varattakhandena sise sisavetham dadeyya; evameva kho me, bhante sariputta, adhimatta sise sisavedana.
mn143:4.5: Na me, bhante sariputta, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
mn143:4.6: Seyyathapi, bhante sariputta, dakkho goghatako va goghatakantevasi va tinhena govikantanena kucchim parikanteyya; evameva kho me, bhante sariputta, adhimatta vata kucchim parikantanti.
mn143:4.7: Na me, bhante sariputta, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo.
mn143:4.8: Seyyathapi, bhante sariputta, dve balavanto purisa dubbalataram purisam nanabahasu gahetva angarakasuya santapeyyum, samparitapeyyum; evameva kho me, bhante sariputta, adhimatto kayasmim daho.
mn143:4.9: Na me, bhante sariputta, khamaniyam na yapaniyam. Balha me dukkha vedana abhikkamanti, no patikkamanti; abhikkamosanam pannayati, no patikkamo”ti.
mn143:5.2: ‘na cakkhum upadiyissami, na ca me cakkhunissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:5.5: ‘na sotam upadiyissami, na ca me sotanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:5.8: ‘na ghanam upadiyissami, na ca me ghananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:5.11: ‘na jivham upadiyissami, na ca me jivhanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:5.14: ‘na kayam upadiyissami, na ca me kayanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:5.17: ‘na manam upadiyissami, na ca me manonissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:6.2: ‘na rupam upadiyissami, na ca me rupanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:6.9: na dhammam upadiyissami, na ca me dhammanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:7.2: ‘na cakkhuvinnanam upadiyissami, na ca me cakkhuvinnananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:7.9: na manovinnanam upadiyissami, na ca me manovinnananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:8.2: ‘na cakkhusamphassam upadiyissami, na ca me cakkhusamphassanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:8.9: na manosamphassam upadiyissami, na ca me manosamphassanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:9.2: ‘na cakkhusamphassajam vedanam upadiyissami, na ca me cakkhusamphassajavedananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:9.9: na manosamphassajam vedanam upadiyissami, na ca me manosamphassajavedananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:10.2: ‘na pathavidhatum upadiyissami, na ca me pathavidhatunissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:10.9: na vinnanadhatum upadiyissami, na ca me vinnanadhatunissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:11.2: ‘na rupam upadiyissami, na ca me rupanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:11.8: na vinnanam upadiyissami, na ca me vinnananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:12.2: ‘na akasanancayatanam upadiyissami, na ca me akasanancayatananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:12.7: na nevasannanasannayatanam upadiyissami, na ca me nevasannanasannayatananissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:13.2: ‘na idhalokam upadiyissami, na ca me idhalokanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:14.2: ‘na paralokam upadiyissami, na ca me paralokanissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:14.5: ‘yampi me dittham sutam mutam vinnatam pattam pariyesitam anupariyesitam anucaritam manasa tampi na upadiyissami, na ca me tannissitam vinnanam bhavissati’ti.
mn143:15.1: Evam vutte, anathapindiko gahapati parodi, assuni pavattesi.
mn143:15.2: Atha kho ayasma anando anathapindikam gahapatim etadavoca:
mn143:15.3: “oliyasi kho tvam, gahapati, samsidasi kho tvam, gahapati”ti?
mn143:15.5: api ca me digharattam sattha payirupasito manobhavaniya ca bhikkhu;
mn143:15.6: na ca me evarupi dhammi katha sutapubba”ti.
mn143:15.7: “Na kho, gahapati, gihinam odatavasananam evarupi dhammi katha patibhati;
mn143:15.8: pabbajitanam kho, gahapati, evarupi dhammi katha patibhati”ti.
mn143:15.9: “Tena hi, bhante sariputta, gihinampi odatavasananam evarupi dhammi katha patibhatu.
mn143:15.10: Santi hi, bhante, kulaputta apparajakkhajatika, assavanata dhammassa parihayanti;
mn143:16.1: Atha kho ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca anando anathapindikam gahapatim imina ovadena ovaditva utthayasana pakkamimsu.
mn143:16.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati, acirapakkante ayasmante ca sariputte ayasmante ca anande, kalamakasi tusitam kayam upapajji.
mn143:17.1: Atha kho anathapindiko devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
mn143:17.2: Ekamantam thito kho anathapindiko devaputto bhagavantam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
mn143:18.4: “samanunno me sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
mn143:19.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
mn143:19.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim annataro devaputto abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi.
mn143:19.3: Ekamantam thito kho so devaputto mam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
mn143:19.21: ‘Samanunno me sattha’ti mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
mn143:20.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn143:20.2: “so hi nuna so, bhante, anathapindiko devaputto bhavissati.
mn143:20.3: Anathapindiko, bhante, gahapati ayasmante sariputte abhippasanno ahosi”ti.
mn143:20.5: Yavatakam kho, ananda, takkaya pattabbam, anuppattam tam taya.
mn143:20.8: Attamano ayasma anando bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
